sn19.12:4.1: “Idhāhaṃ, āvuso, gijjhakūṭā pabbatā orohanto addasaṃ purisaṃ gūthakūpe nimuggaṃ ubhohi hatthehi gūthaṃ khādantaṃ … pe …
sn19.12:4.2: eso, bhikkhave, satto imasmiṃyeva rājagahe duṭṭhabrāhmaṇo ahosi.
sn19.12:4.3: So kassapassa sammāsambuddhassa pāvacane bhikkhusaṃghaṃ bhattena nimantetvā doṇiyo gūthassa pūrāpetvā etadavoca—
sn19.12:4.4: aho bhonto yāvadatthaṃ bhuñjantu ceva harantu cā’ti … pe ….
